description: This file defines a mock class ServiceMock for unit testing, which simulates the behavior of a service interface with various methods, using Google Mock framework.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the Service interface for unit testing, using Google Mock to simulate service behaviors.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign string of the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix associated with the service.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns the configuration line for the service.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data storage path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature supports a given uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with provided parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns the subsystems associated with the service.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a uint32_t and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification object.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification object.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model string.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service is running in background.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns the accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path for proxy/stub.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns a hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs substitution with a string.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the current reason.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns the system root path.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns the system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns the plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.

methods.name: StartMode (overload)
methods.description: Returns the start mode with a parameter.

methods.name: Resumed (overload)
methods.description: Returns the resumed status with a parameter.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Retrieves metadata information.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernate operation with a reason code.
